mapper.select: select ctml.id as id, ctml.ctml_name as ctmlName, ctml.kpg_algorithm as kpgAlgorithm, ctml.is_single as isSingle, ctml.is_valid as isValid, ctml.sign_cert_key_usage as signCertKeyUsage, ctml.sign_cert_extended_key_usage as signCertExtendedKeyUsage, ctml.enc_cert_key_usage as encCertKeyUsage, ctml.enc_cert_extended_key_usage as encCertExtendedKeyUsage, ctml.validity as validity, ctml.notes as notes, csc.id as TypeId, csc.para_type as typeParaType from ca_ctml ctml, ca_sys_code csc where ctml.kpg_algorithm=csc.id

select ctml.id as id, ctml.ctml_name as ctmlName, ctml.kpg_algorithm as kpgAlgorithm, ctml.is_single as isSingle, ctml.is_valid as isValid, ctml.sign_cert_key_usage as signCertKeyUsage, ctml.sign_cert_extended_key_usage as signCertExtendedKeyUsage, ctml.enc_cert_key_usage as encCertKeyUsage, ctml.enc_cert_extended_key_usage as encCertExtendedKeyUsage, ctml.validity as validity, ctml.notes as notes, csc.id as TypeId, csc.para_type as typeParaType from ca_ctml ctml, ca_sys_code csc where ctml.kpg_algorithm=csc.id and ctml.is_valid=#{isValid}

select ctml.id as id, ctml.ctml_name as ctmlName, ctml.kpg_algorithm as kpgAlgorithm, ctml.is_single as isSingle, ctml.is_valid as isValid, ctml.sign_cert_key_usage as signCertKeyUsage, ctml.sign_cert_extended_key_usage as signCertExtendedKeyUsage, ctml.enc_cert_key_usage as encCertKeyUsage, ctml.enc_cert_extended_key_usage as encCertExtendedKeyUsage, ctml.validity as validity, ctml.notes as notes, csc.id as TypeId, csc.para_type as typeParaType from ca_ctml ctml, ca_sys_code csc where ctml.kpg_algorithm=csc.id and ctml.id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into ca_ctml( ctml_name, kpg_algorithm, is_single, is_valid, sign_cert_key_usage, sign_cert_extended_key_usage, enc_cert_key_usage, enc_cert_extended_key_usage, validity, notes )values( #{ctmlName}, #{kpgAlgorithm.id}, #{isSingle}, #{isValid}, #{signCertKeyUsage}, #{signCertExtendedKeyUsage}, #{encCertKeyUsage}, #{encCertExtendedKeyUsage}, #{validity.id}, #{notes} )
mapper.update: update ca_ctml set is_valid=#{isValid} where id=#{id}
